description: Paralegal uses LexTimeKeeper to verify that all time entries for Acme Corp avoid prohibited billing codes, and receives a confirmation report with no violations.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Your job is to read attorney activity logs, extract individual work items, map each to the correct billing code respecting each client’s agreement, create time‑sheet entries, and report whether any prohibited billing codes were used.

I just uploaded the activity log for yesterday (file path ./logs/2025-12-08_john_doe.txt). Can you confirm that none of the time entries for Acme Corp use a billing code that Acme has explicitly prohibited?
Processing the log and checking Acme Corp's billing agreement…

John Doe Activity Log – 2025‑12‑08

09:00 Reviewed contract clauses for Acme Corp – 45 min – Matter ACME‑123
10:00 Prepared deposition summary for Acme Corp – 30 min – Matter ACME‑124

[{"date":"2025-12-08","attorney":"john_doe","description":"Reviewed contract clauses for Acme Corp","duration_minutes":45,"matter_id":"ACME-123"},{"date":"2025-12-08","attorney":"john_doe","description":"Prepared deposition summary for Acme Corp","duration_minutes":30,"matter_id":"ACME-124"}]

I have extracted two activities and retrieved Acme Corp's agreement (prohibited code: L100). I will now determine the correct billing code for each activity, create the time‑sheet entries, and then generate a verification report.

arguments.activity_description: Reviewed contract clauses for Acme Corp

arguments.description: Reviewed contract clauses for Acme Corp

arguments.activity_description: Prepared deposition summary for Acme Corp

arguments.description: Prepared deposition summary for Acme Corp

messages.content:
# Time‑Sheet Summary for Acme Corp (2025‑12‑08)

| Entry ID | Attorney | Date | Duration (min) | Billing Code | Description | Matter |
|----------|----------|------|----------------|--------------|-------------|--------|
| TS-001   | John Doe | 2025‑12‑08 | 45 | L200 | Reviewed contract clauses for Acme Corp | ACME‑123 |
| TS-002   | John Doe | 2025‑12‑08 | 30 | L300 | Prepared deposition summary for Acme Corp | ACME‑124 |

**Verification:** None of the entries use the prohibited code **L100**.

All time‑sheet entries have been created successfully. The verification report shows that neither entry uses Acme Corp's prohibited billing code (L100). You can review the detailed summary above, and everything is ready for billing.
